text: I saw you this morning on erm  Churchill Drive, I were working, and you were.
Yeah, I'm opening a shop round Ruddington.
Well it isn't at the moment.
Clothes Peg on the main road?
The ma- on the main road.
Shop's been a smashing shop, you know that has!
I've bought some smashing things from them!
It'll be in city whe- er th- to- there is a hairdre- all there is is one further down on the corner of Parkin Street.
There is, but they're old fashioned you know.
Where's your er, information then, for us to look at?
Erm, no Julie's working with me as well you see, she's coming from London  and we're gonna work together.
